version_description: - Bug fixes

- New Animal: Mouse!
- New Swag: 1920s outfit, lots of female chothing!
- Powerup Balancing
- A few map fixes
- Bugfixes
- Check the news feed for more details!

- Fixed several bugs with strings.
- Fixed profile icon for the Mouse animal.

- New animations
- Lots of new arena animals and rewards
- New arena map
- More detailed leaderboards
- New arena season ticket
- Value pack offers when you gain a league
- Minor fixes
- Minor fixes

Halloween update!
- New spooky look in the game
- Halloween crate with cool accessories
- Lots of new skins, including vampires, mummies and more
- Pump Fiction - Score kills with the special pumpkin sawblade to earn unique icons

- Fixed a bug with some shoes not showing on avatar
- Includes fix for crashes related to some in game accessories
- Fixed Halloween crate: It is now displayed properly with a timer

New avatars: Moose and Frog!
New accessories: Chef outfit!

Bug fixes

If you like Fun Run 3, please take the time to write a review. It really helps!

Updates UI for wide screens
Bug fixes

THE BIG WINTER UPDATE IS HERE:
- New map: Frozen Falls
- New animal: Polar Bear
- New accessories: Holiday and winter clothes
- New event: Collect Snowmen while racing to earn Winter Gifts
- New item: Super Star
- And much more! Check the news feed in the game for all the changes.

- Valentine Event starts February 1st! Collect hearts and earn rewards!
- 3 lovely dog Animals!
- Party accessory sets
- New exclusive Prestige accessories

- Bug fixes

- Valentine Event starts February 1st! Collect hearts and earn rewards!

- Party accessory sets

- New Animal: Llama

Added additional languages
Bug fixes
Bugfixes!
Fixes a bug where some players got stuck in the loading screen.

New forest map: Fungi Valley
New desert map: Grand Mesa
New map icons for all maps
2 New Animals! Antelope and Crocodile

Various bugfixes

- New Toyland map!
- New Skunk Animal!
- 4 New Punk Skins!
- Punk Accessories!

- New Coin Packs available for purchase!
- Arena Retry: Option to remove a loss from an Arena Run

- Updated UI for iPhoneX
- Performance improvements
- Bugfixes

- 4 New Punk Skins!

- Updated UI for iPhoneX

Adventurer!
- Complete Daily Quests to earn Adventurer tokens from the active area!
- Collect 3 Adventurer tokens to earn a reward!
- One crate for each area! 61 new items to collect!
- Updated Desert chest!

- Added a confirmation step when starting new quests
- Bugfixes

Adventurer!
- Complete Daily Quests to earn Adventurer tokens from the active area!
- Collect 3 Adventurer tokens to earn a reward!
- One crate for each area! 76 new items to collect!
- Updated Desert chest!

- Added a confirmation step when starting new quests
- Bugfixes
Bug fixes.

New Avatar: Elephant!
Scene Accessories!

Updated animations
Option to remove recruits
Various bugfixes

New powerups and balancing!
- 7 new exciting powerups to add to your arsenal!
- Updates to existing powerups. Check out ingame patch notes for details!

Daily Xp Bonus
- Level up faster with more ways to get Xp

Halloween Event
- The Halloween event will start in October

Various bugfixes

- Fix notification icon on Event button showing when quest is on cooldown
- Add Halloween themed music
- Various bugfixes

Get ready for Runner Pass Season 5!
- 50 new tiers to unlock!
- New Animal - Platypus!
- 2 new Skins - Including Deep Sea Fox!
- 11 new accessories - Mermaid and Mecha Suit!
- 11 new player-icons
- And many more prizes to unlock

- Bug fixes

Get ready for Runner Pass Season 4!
- 65 new tiers to unlock!
- 2 new Animals!
- 3 new Skins!
- 23 new accessories
- 14 new player-icons
- And many more prizes to unlock
Highlights:
- Spirit Squirrel
- Peacock
- Evil Peacock

- Bug fixes

Various bugfixes
- fixed visual bug with "Fiery Shield" powerup
- fixed bug where "Blizzard" powerup did not update game feed
- fixed halloween background for Arena
- improved animation for Ghost Brew activation
- fixed issues where UI would not update related to Daily Xp Bonus
- minor UI fixes

Holiday Event!
- New prizes revealed every day of December
- Collect snowmen in races to participate
- Unlock new items and other prizes!

- Option in store to remove all accessories
- Reduced app size
- Bug fixes

- 65 new tiers to unlock!
- 4 new Animals!

- Owl Ice Skin with frost eyes
- New Crocodile Fire Skin with flaming eyes

New Competitive Game Mode: Cups
- Compete with 50 players to get the best score in a limited number of races
- Earn rewards each Cup season

Runner Pass Season 6 - Starts October 21st
- New Avatars and Skin: Pig and Deep Sea Dragon!
- New Accessories: Valkyrie, Musketeer and more!
- Lots of other rewards!

Halloween Event - Starts October 21st
- Collect pumpkins and help Dr. Pickle!
- Get rewarded with the new Monster Chest!

Bug fixes and UI updates
Bug fixes and minor UI updates

- Fix notification icon on Event button showing when quest is on cooldown
- Add Halloween themed music
- Various bugfixes
- Stability Improvements
- Network stability improvements
- Various bug-fixes and UI improvements
- Bug fixes and other performance improvements

Winter Event!
- New Winter Chest with 12 new items including the Ferret!
- Collect snowflakes in races and the Arena to make Aurora Essence
- Use Aurora Essence in races to collect shards and earn the new Winter Chest

Runner Pass
- Season 7 starts on December 1st
- Rewards include Husky, Ice Husky and Atom Superhero set

- Improved control introduction for new players
- Added explanations to locked game modes
- Bugfixes
- Performance improvements

Runner Pass Season 8 and Valentine Event Starts January 30th
- Corgi
- Mecha Owl, White Direwolf and Love Peacock
- Cupid outfit
- and much more!

- It is no longer required to own an animal in order to use or purchase a skin for the animal

- Fixes for Love Peacock tail showing wrongly when winning
- Allow players to use Love Perfume when they have completed the Runner Pass
- Fix timer in Valentine Button showing incorrect time left
- Minor bug-fixes and UI updates

UI improvements for reporting players. These will be released in stages over the next weeks.

Season 9
- Kingfisher animal!
- Neon Samurai Outfit!

Runner Pass Update
- Runner Pass seasons will now last for 2 weeks starting with Season 9
- Runner Pass now costs 350 gems
- Each tier in the Runner Pass now only requires 5 Paws to unlock

Stay safe!
